Reviews.Title: works great but...
Reviews.Author: Maccabi14
Reviews.Content: The keychain works great - when you get it programmed into your system (Ge Simon). Oh and by the way it came with instructions in Chinese!Had a problem finding the code to install it as it's not the master code - you have to use an installers code which is different. Once I found the code (which my security company didn't have)I was able to install it. NOTE - you must install it in group 01 - there are instructions floating around the internet to install it in 10 WHICH IS WRONG - if you install in 10 - your system will search for it even if you take the keychain out of the house and you will get a system malfunction.

Reviews.Title: Poor battery life
Reviews.Author: Paul C. Easton "I manage e-discovery worldwid...
Reviews.Content: I bought this through Front Point to work with my GE Simon XT system. I've had it for less than one year and am on my third battery. Perhaps some button is being constantly pushed when it is in my pocket, but my wife's has the same issue. If the buttons are so easy to be activated while in pockets or purses, then it is poorly designed for use as a key fob. With fresh batteries it works well and is a real convenience. But it is annoying to have to change the batteries so frequently.

Reviews.Title: Great Keyfob replacement for Simon XT.
Reviews.Author: NJ Contributor "Eddie"
Reviews.Content: My wife's keyfob broke after some heavy use and I was in need for a quick replacement but didn't want to spend a lot of money on the OEM. This unit met my needs at perfection.Unit arrived quickly by Amazon's Vendor DG Surplus and I had it setup within 5 minutes.The instructions for the Simon XT were found in the web and I recommend you search for your specific system as they tend to differ.This unit supports multiple systems so the instructions will be different.For the Simon XT- Cycle thru the menu and select 'System Programming'- Enter Code (Make sure to enter the Installer Code - for Simon XT is 4321)- Cycle thru until you find Sensors- Hit the Sensors option, then Learn Sensors- Select the option given for trip sensor- On the remote, press the lock/unlock button simultaneously- Thereafter, make sure the trip sensor is on Grp 1.All set.

Reviews.Title: BAD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Even after I emailed the seller on this product to ask if it would fit with my system AND he told me "sure, no problem......It doesn't work.  You need a masters degree in engineering to figure out the instructions and I have to have the TECH from ADT come out and  program it which will cost me another $25 on top of the $39 I paid.  So much for quick and easy.  Misleading and not a good product

Reviews.Title: Had them for years still work
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: Purchased one because old one was too beauty after about 10 years of use. A little pricey though, that's the reason for the 4 stars, but works great and has good range

Reviews.Title: Don't wash your alarm box
Reviews.Author: Cecilia M. Alexanderwoosley
Reviews.Content: I accidentally washed my jeans with my keys in my pocket. Not good for an alarm box. So I found a new one on Amazon. It is brand new and works great. I received it quickly in prime condition. Amazon is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: kate
Reviews.Content: Have had this key fob for 3 years now and it still works great.  We actually have 4.  One for each family member.The customer service at AVSX technologies that I got it from via Amazon is incredible .  I got my whole GE Simon XT security system from them and haven't had any problems

Reviews.Title: Great price for a useful device
Reviews.Author: James Lee "James Lee"
Reviews.Content: Configured one of these for a home security system (GE Concord), and another for a business perimeter alarm system (NX-8V2).  Easy to install, has a pretty decent range, inexpensive.  Considerably less work than programming a delay and entering in a key code.  The battery is a common type (2032) - simple to replace, last a long time.Documentation for 'learning' these devices - well, you'll have to rely on the documentation for your particular alarm system.

Reviews.Title: Works for Me!
Reviews.Author: penname2011
Reviews.Content: Though I haven't used it much, sure makes it easier to disarm the alarm, especially if the alarm is set to "No Delay" entries.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: D. Vogel "Davevo"
Reviews.Content: I needed a spare remote for my outdoor lock box.  This one is identical to the one I got with the GE alarm system and works perfectly.I can recommend this product.  It's easy to program into the system and works great!

Reviews.Title: Excellent for my GE Concord 4 system
Reviews.Author: Ron Moronson "RMoronson"
Reviews.Content: Added this to my Concord 4 system with ease.  Nice, solid OEM keyfob.  Now to add some lighting functions to take advantage of the light button on the keyfob.

Reviews.Title: Works just fine for me.
Reviews.Author: Rainy
Reviews.Content: Works just fine for me. Use it every day. Works just fine for me. Use it every day. Works just fine for me.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: W. TIMMONS
Reviews.Content: Excellent yard sign for placing out in front of your home, to warn off possible intruders that your protected by GE security system.
